content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":123571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー、なになに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":123572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「愛しの勝子さんへ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To my beloved Katsuko...\""},{"lineNumber":123573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？　恋文！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!? A love letter!?\""},{"lineNumber":123574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、恋文とは違います……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's different from a love letter...\""},{"lineNumber":123575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあなんだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":123576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ko\""},{"lineNumber":123577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ko?\""},{"lineNumber":123578,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝子の頬がポッと赤くなる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Katsuko's cheeks flushed brightly."},{"lineNumber":123579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「恋人からの手紙です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a letter from my lover...\""},{"lineNumber":123580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":123581,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、驚きすぎですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, you're overreacting.\""},{"lineNumber":123582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いや、すごーく意外で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, it's just really unexpected...\""},{"lineNumber":123583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは本当に恋人なのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that really a lover?"},{"lineNumber":123584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　結婚詐欺とかじゃないのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"  Could it be a marriage fraud or something?"},{"lineNumber":123585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前、騙されとらんか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Are you not being deceived?\""},{"lineNumber":123586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違います！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No!\""},{"lineNumber":123587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「相手は、む、昔から知ってる相手で……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The person is, um, someone I've known for a long time...\""},{"lineNumber":123588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何者だ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who is it?\""},{"lineNumber":123589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う〜〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uuuuu...\""},{"lineNumber":123590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……虎子の弟です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It's Torako's younger brother.\""},{"lineNumber":123591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":123592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜、どっかでなんか聞いたような……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I think I've heard something about that somewhere...\""},{"lineNumber":123593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　確か幼なじみとかなんとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Something like childhood friends or something...\""},{"lineNumber":123594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、そうです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":123595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私にとっても弟のようなものだったんですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He was like a younger brother to me as well...\""},{"lineNumber":123596,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-that...\""},{"lineNumber":123597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":123598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「実は以前から好きだったと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He said he'd loved me for a long time...\""},{"lineNumber":123599,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言われまして……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  That's what he said...\""},{"lineNumber":123600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今は大陸の戦場と","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now he's fighting on the continent's battlefield"},{"lineNumber":123601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　JAPANに離れて戦っていますが……","translatedEnglishLine":"  and separated here in JAPAN...\""},{"lineNumber":123602,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、いずれ……あの……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, eventually... um...\""},{"lineNumber":123603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「け、結婚しよう！　って……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-let's get married! He said...!\""},{"lineNumber":123604,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kyaa!\""},{"lineNumber":123605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hooh...\""},{"lineNumber":123606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんて、いや……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What am I saying, no...\""},{"lineNumber":123607,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私、なにを言ってるんでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"  What am I talking about?\""},{"lineNumber":123608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ホントにな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously.\""},{"lineNumber":123609,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it?\""},{"lineNumber":123610,"originalJapaneseLine":"（戦争が終わったら二人の仲は引き裂くとして……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Once the war ends, their relationship will be torn apart...)"},{"lineNumber":123611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　何か不穏な気配……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? There's some unsettling atmosphere...\""},{"lineNumber":123612,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……勝虎の二人は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... the two from Kachitora"},{"lineNumber":123613,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな色恋沙汰とは無縁だと思ってた」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I thought were completely unrelated to such romantic matters.\""},{"lineNumber":123614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私まであんな","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't lump me in with such"},{"lineNumber":123615,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お子様の虎子と一緒にしないで下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"  childish Torako.\""},{"lineNumber":123616,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それで、その……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, um...\""},{"lineNumber":123617,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この話はどうか内密にお願いします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please keep this story strictly confidential!\""},{"lineNumber":123618,"originalJapaneseLine":"「虎子以外には謙信様に愛様にも","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apart from Torako, even Kenshin-sama and Ai-sama"},{"lineNumber":123619,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ話してないことですから」","translatedEnglishLine":"  haven't been told yet.\""},{"lineNumber":123620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why?\""},{"lineNumber":123621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せ、戦場にいる身でそんな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'm someone at the battlefield, so if people find out about this..."},{"lineNumber":123622,"originalJapaneseLine":"　気が緩んでると思われるじゃないですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"  they'd think I'm letting my guard down.\""},{"lineNumber":123623,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":123624,"originalJapaneseLine":"（愛ちゃんは知ってそうな気もするが……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I feel like Ai-chan might know...)"},{"lineNumber":123625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、あの生真面目な勝子が","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, that serious Katsuko"},{"lineNumber":123626,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここまでゆるゆるになるとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  becoming so relaxed like this...\""},{"lineNumber":123627,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるでお菓子食ってるときの虎子のよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's just like Torako when she's eating sweets.\""},{"lineNumber":123628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「失礼な！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"How rude!\""},{"lineNumber":123629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「二人とも失礼だよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Both of you are rude!\""},{"lineNumber":123630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだ、虎子いたの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What, Torako was here?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝子の頬がポッと赤くなる。
結婚詐欺とかじゃないのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be a marriage fraud or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相手は、む、昔から知ってる相手で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The person is, um, someone I've known for a long time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜、どっかでなんか聞いたような……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I think I've heard something about that somewhere..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確か幼なじみとかなんとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something like childhood friends or something..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私にとっても弟のようなものだったんですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was like a younger brother to me as well..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実は以前から好きだったと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He said he'd loved me for a long time..."
"Right now he's fighting on the continent's battlefield

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANに離れて戦っていますが……
私、なにを言ってるんでしょう」
（戦争が終わったら二人の仲は引き裂くとして……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Once the war ends, their relationship will be torn apart...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな色恋沙汰とは無縁だと思ってた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought were completely unrelated to such romantic matters."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お子様の虎子と一緒にしないで下さい」
「この話はどうか内密にお願いします！」
「虎子以外には謙信様に愛様にも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apart from Torako, even Kenshin-sama and Ai-sama

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ話してないことですから」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I'm someone at the battlefield, so if people find out about this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気が緩んでると思われるじゃないですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they'd think I'm letting my guard down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （愛ちゃんは知ってそうな気もするが……）
「しかし、あの生真面目な勝子が
ここまでゆるゆるになるとは……」
「まるでお菓子食ってるときの虎子のよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She's just like Torako when she's eating sweets."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

結婚詐欺とかじゃないのか？

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He was like a younger brother to me as well..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He said he'd loved me for a long time..."
